name: Eclipse Psychiatry Outpatient Treatment Center PLLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Eclipse Psychiatry Outpatient Treatment Center PLLC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Mesa, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $15.9M in Medicaid payments across 44K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $15.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
